name: MercMoney
0:
”Alexa, open MercMoney”
”Alexa, ask MercMoney for my financial summary”
”Alexa, ask MercMoney for my budgets”
skdetail:
Rated: Guidance Suggested. This skill contains: dynamic content.
Invocation Name: merc money
Developer Terms of Use
des:
MercMoney from Mercantile Bank of Michigan is a free virtual financial assistant available any time of the day. Ask about specific financial accounts, recent transactions, spending, budgets, branch locations, financial terms and much more.

After you've enabled the skill, say "Alexa, open MercMoney".

Here are some examples what you can talk about:

Financial Summary:
- "How am I doing overall?"
- "What's my net worth?"

Accounts:
- "What's my checking account balance?"
- "How are my investments doing?"

Transactions:
- "What are my most recent transactions?"
- "What's my latest transaction?"
- "Last 3 checking account transactions"
- "Transactions for groceries"
- "Last gas transaction"

Earnings / Spending:
- "How much did I earn this year?"
- "What was my income last month?"
- "How's my spending?"
- "What did I spend this year?"
- "What did I spend on restaurants last month?"

Budgets:
- "How are my budgets doing?"
- "How's my shopping budget?"
- "What can I spend on groceries?"

Branch / ATM Locations:
- "How far is the nearest branch?"
- "Where is the nearest ATM?"

FAQs:
- "What's my routing number?"
- "What's a mortgage?"
- "Explain interest rate"


To talk about personal finance related topics you'll first have to link your Mercantile Bank account. Once the skill initiates the account linking you'll have to do the following in your Alexa app:
- Securely sign in with your Mercantile Bank user ID and password.
- Provide a voice passcode for added security.
